Uses of Interface
com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.HandlerExceptionResolver

  • Packages that use HandlerExceptionResolver 
    Package Description
    com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.handler
    Provides standard HandlerMapping implementations, including abstract base classes for custom implementations.
    com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.mvc.annotation
    Support package for annotation-based PortletMVC4Spring controllers.

    • Uses of HandlerExceptionResolver in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.handler

      Classes in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.handler that implement HandlerExceptionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver
      Abstract base class for HandlerExceptionResolver implementations.
      class  SimpleMappingExceptionResolver
      HandlerExceptionResolver implementation that allows for mapping exception class names to view names, either for a set of given handlers or for all handlers in the DispatcherPortlet.

    • Uses of HandlerExceptionResolver in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.mvc.annotation

      Classes in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.mvc.annotation that implement HandlerExceptionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotationMethodHandlerExceptionResolver
      Implementation of the HandlerExceptionResolver interface that handles exceptions through the ExceptionHandler annotation.
